title: Kuragehime Gaiden: Barakura - Bara no Aru Kurashi
original_name: 海月姫外伝 BARAKURA ～薔薇のある暮らし～
sinopse: Kuragehime Gaiden: Barakura - Bara no Aru Kurashi is a spin-off manga of Kuragehime, about middle-aged Japanese women who love everything Korean. Chiyoko (Chieko's mother) is a K-pop fan. Together with her girlfriends, they decide to go to South Korea to pursue actor Bae Yongjoon.
